name: Nicodemus
description: a wizened old man with a ready smile.

52: "Good $T, Avatar. For what purpose hast thou come?"
"Oh, nothing a great adventurer such as yourself would be @interested in."
He gets a suspicious look in his eyes.
"Nope, nope, I won't talk about that!"
796: "But none of you has a spell@book!"
980: "In which Circle does $Y wish to study?"
"As everybody knows, there are only eight circles."
"I sense that $Y is only ready for the #1$1 Circle."
"But such matters are not my concern..."
"I have no spells of that circle."
"Perhaps $Y is not ready for this circle."
$N hands $Y a piece of rune-covered parchment.
1719: less(plus(canCarry(integer(value 3)), weight(byte 88, integer(value 1))), weight(data(dword 3437, integer(value 2)), byte 1))
2194: "I'll give thee #5; thou dost not need the rest."
2325: "I'll give thee #5; thou cannot have the rest."
2855: "If thou knowest the Enchant spell, thou canst lock a spell within the staff for quick use!"
"A yew staff costs 100 gold pieces, but it's worth twice that!"
3265: The old man hands $Y a yew staff.
